meanings: (사람이) cry (over/about), weep, (큰 소리로) howl, bawl, wail
A crying baby will be breastfed

examples.korean: I heard a child sobbing loudly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 어떤 아이가 크게 흐느껴 우는 소리를 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They ignored the baby’s screams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 아기가 악을 쓰며 우는 것을 무시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They ignored the baby’s screams. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The street echoed with the cries of children. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거리에는 아이들이 우는 소리가 가득했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The street echoed with the cries of children. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He thought that crying was a sign of weakness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 우는 것은 나약함의 표시라고 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He thought that crying was a sign of weakness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I hate it when people cry. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 사람들이 우는 것은 질색이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
